# Roadmap

## Towards version 1.0

- [x] Project initializer (for `npm init`)
- [ ] Spread dynamic route parameters
- [ ] Static site generation
- [ ] Serverless support
- [ ] Link prefetching
- [ ] Service workers
- [ ] Localizable and customizable router
- [ ] Data caching
